channel.title: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?
channel.description:
[img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/610.png[/img]
[size=24pt]Server Status - Online Beta [/size]
[u][b][u][b]Server Information[/b][/u] -[/b][/u] Immortals Hell will be one huge team vs. team server. Once you log in you are able to choose between two different teams with two unique homes, and abilities. (The Hero and The Villain.) After you choose your side you will automatically be teleported to your teams base and you are apart of that particular teams revolution against your mortal enemies. Although you are not able to infiltrate the opposing force's base you can attack them anywhere else in the whole entire realm, making this a far from independent gaming experience. You are apart of your own team trying to reclaim the land from the other. Every area apart from banks is player vs player, with exception of your own team mates. Making this server one of a kind. You decide to attempt to go skilling or bossing while leaving the safety of your base.
[u][b]Server Features/ Media - [/b][/u]
Custom Loyalty Titles "Hero" and "Villain" [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/111.png[/img]
Working Money Pouch [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/211.png[/img]
Starting Point At Which You Choose Your Destiny [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/311.png[/img]
[img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/410.png[/img]
You Are Not Allowed To Ever Attack Your Own Team Mates [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/510.png[/img]
Hero Home [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/710.png[/img]
Villain Home [img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/16/97/89/810.png[/img]
FORUMS FEATURES Vbulletin None Nulled Highscores Vote4Cash Auto Donations System
Media Sorry For Horrible Quality i will try to make better ones in the future sorry ): Tree Stumps [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gprRF.gif[/img] Clipped Fire Making [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IE7HH.gif[/img] Clipped Monsters [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rjl1v.gif[/img]
Downloadable Launcher Look! Our Downloadable client will have a launcher that updates the client and more! Atm its only 25% Complete here is what we have So far! [[B]All Credits go to one of our coders TFK IH[/B]. Btw Im Sir Chase so dont be trolled XD
Icon [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mOCcZ.png[/img]
Current Launcher On Click Look [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NRG6Z.png[/img]
Current Launcher Page 2 On Click Look [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kb7Wf.png[/img]
When you click on Play Immortals Hell! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nGiZD.png[/img]
Credits<3 Tab Real Staff Team Ect [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7SCFB.png[/img]
Quest Center [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GOk2c.png[/img]
Help Section [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KItrV.png[/img]
Updates [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U6dgF.png[/img]
We are going to add Quest Help/ Music Tab/ Vote/ Donate and more!

item.title: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:439141”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541840.msg3969687#msg3969687 date=1334026447]
Looks like an advertisement to me…but w/e

The originality is great.
[/quote]Nolan is actually a co-developer from FJ he wouldn’t blatantly advertise like that ( he was also the person I put in charge of the community cause I would literally tell people Idgaf about inserverdrama LOL )[/quote]

I doubt it was meant to be an advertisement, but i didnt want people to report it as one. As i said

[quote=“Daginith, post:7, topic:439141”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=541840.msg3969690#msg3969690 date=1334026626]

Looks like an advertisement to me…but w/e

The originality is great.

Thank You, but I can assure you this is HEAVY Development
[/quote]
Mk, just dont want it to get taken down for being an advertisement ;)[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?

item.title: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Chase1 Sir_Chase
item.description:
@Sir_Chase1 wrote:

artem543:

Looks pretty awsome. I tryed making that type of server before called (sara vs zamo). But, what happe when you get killed?

Atm you loose all your stuff im trying to make it were inside Rs (“none wild”) that you dont loose items. Im gana try to make it when the enemy kill you they get like 10-100k (“strict eco”)

Read full topic
item.source: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?

item.title: Immortals Hell! Are you friend or foe?
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

artem543:

Looks pretty awsome. I tryed making that type of server before called (sara vs zamo). But, what happe when you get killed?

Depending on your chosen team and location you will be teleported to a specified area, either losing your stuff or not, varies on location. [quote=“Loveandpower, post:11, topic:439141”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541840.msg3969687#msg3969687 date=1334026447]
Looks like an advertisement to me…but w/e

The originality is great.
[/quote]Nolan is actually a co-developer from FJ he wouldn’t blatantly advertise like that ( he was also the person I put in charge of the community cause I would literally tell people Idgaf about inserverdrama LOL )[/quote]

And boy did we have a lot of it

Read full topic

[size=24pt]Server Status - Online Beta [/size]

Server Information - Immortals Hell will be one huge team vs. team server. Once you log in you are able to choose between two different teams with two unique homes, and abilities. (The Hero and The Villain.) After you choose your side you will automatically be teleported to your teams base and you are apart of that particular teams revolution against your mortal enemies. Although you are not able to infiltrate the opposing force’s base you can attack them anywhere else in the whole entire realm, making this a far from independent gaming experience. You are apart of your own team trying to reclaim the land from the other. Every area apart from banks is player vs player, with exception of your own team mates. Making this server one of a kind. You decide to attempt to go skilling or bossing while leaving the safety of your base.
